page.title: 19Positive Attitudes
page.content: The standard of living is rising in the community.Families spend a lot on the care and improvement of their homes and gardens.Most families have television,children often having their own sets.People record and store programmes for later playing.Young and old are fashion conscious,influenced by television commercials.Articles bought are of good quality.There is a great choice of electrical goods,and imported or out-of-season foodstuffs. People are health conscious,dieting and keeping fit by jogging or other sports.On weekday evenings schools are used for social activities.People give time and cash to help charities. Local police help teachers to educate young people in road safety and foster good relations with authority. Conservation of flora,fauna,buildings and traditions is well supported.
